DOC.brief_title: Contrast-Enhanced Digital Mammography ( CEDM ) vs Contrast-Enhanced Breast MRI ( CE-MRI ) Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective determine accurately one estimate size index tumor preoperative imaging patient know breast cancer , use pathology reference standard . The primary endpoint , measure CEDM , CE-MRI , maximum diameter ( mm ) index tumor .
DOC.criteria: Identify inclusion criterion 1 . Histologically confirm invasive and/or situ carcinoma breast 2 . Any race ethnicity 3 . Females 1870 year age 4 . Willing able provide inform consent 5 . Subject CEMRI exam within one month ( 31 day ) enrol CEMRI exam within one month ( 31 day ) prior enrol interval treatment procedure CEDM CEMRI Identify exclusion criterion 1 . Unwilling unable undergo inform consent 2 . Planned undergo neoadjuvant chemotherapy 3 . Breast implant 4 . Pregnant ( NOTE : If subject unsure pregnancy status , pregnancy test perform confirmation . ) 5 . Breastfeeding 6 . Surgical excision biopsy proven malignancy 7 . Known allergy gadolinium contrast agent 8 . Contraindication MRI ( ex : pacemaker , ferromagnetic aneurysm clip ferromagnetic surgical implant severe claustrophobia ) 9 . Suspected risk complication contrast agent . These include standard iodinate contrast agent contraindication : 1 . Subject renal insufficiency determine elevated serum creatinine treat dialysis . 2 . Documentation normal eGFR ( MDRD ) within previous 2 month require subject follow risk factor renal insufficiency : . Age > 70 ii . Diabetes iii . Personal history renal disease iv . Family history renal disease ( e.g. , polycystic kidney disease ) v. Known solitary kidney vi . Other medical condition may affect kidney ( e.g. , Lupus , multiple myeloma ) c. Subject take metformin ( Glucophage ) within 48 hour procedure d. Subject prior reaction iodinate contrast e. Subject multiple allergy and/ severe asthma regularly treat medication f. Subject episode serious allergic reaction ( anaphylaxis ) substance
